# Lightbridge-KS

### 👨🏻‍💻 &nbsp;About Me

👋 Hello there!, I'm a medical doctor who has passion for data science, programming, and statistics.

💻 My first and favorite programming language is `R`. Other languages is on the way such as Python and JavaScript.
